description: This healthy Vegetarian Stir Fry is quick and easy to make and perfect for a family weeknight dinner!
name: Clean Out The Refrigerator Vegetarian Stir Fry Recipe
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons sesame oil, or oil of choice
4 cups thinly sliced vegetables, I used carrots, peas, purple cabbage and red pepper
1 recipe for The Best Stir Fry Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add sesame oil and vegetables. Cook vegetables until softened, about 10 minutes.
Add the chickpeas, stir and then pour jar of stir fry sauce in. Cook until sauce has thickened and coats the back of the spatula, 3-5 minutes.
Serve stir fry over rice, noodles or polenta and top with fresh herbs if desired.
